titles.title: A resolution designating May 2008 as "National Physical Fitness and Sports Month" and the week of May 1 through May 7, 2008, as "National Physical Education and Sports Week".

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as passed Senate

bill.summary: 5/1/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates: (1) May 2008 as National Physical Fitness and Sports Month; and (2) May 1-May 7, 2008, as National Physical Education and Sports Week.
